channel.title: I'm looking for a server like this
channel.description:
I'm having a bit of a hard time finding a server like this because of all the newer versions now a days. I'm looking for a 317 server that comes with a client that it works with. Basically what I'm looking for is one with no custom items, has shops, training spots and mini games. Skills don't matter too much. I remember seeing this a lot back in the day, any recommendations?
Thanks for your time and help

item.title: I'm looking for a server like this
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Well if you are looking for a base, you aren’t going to find many without customs… Thats all kids make these days. So you could you Hyperion, Runesource or Apollo. Although i don’t think apollo is even out yet… If you add in all the things you want im sure you would become better at programming.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm looking for a server like this

item.title: I'm looking for a server like this
item.dc:creator: @knueppel7799 knueppel7799
item.description:
@knueppel7799 wrote:

you could try delta but people don’t like it for some reason, but delta has lots of bugs some are easy to fix and some are not.
